findings.message:
BPool.setSwapFee(uint256) (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#836-846) should emit an event for: 
	- _swapFee = swapFee (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#845)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
BPool.setController(address).manager (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#848) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _controller = manager (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#854)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message: BPool._pushUnderlying(address,address,uint256) (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#1351-1356) has external calls inside a loop: xfer = IERC20(erc20).transfer(to,amount) (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#1354)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message: BPool._pullUnderlying(address,address,uint256) (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#1344-1349) has external calls inside a loop: xfer = IERC20(erc20).transferFrom(from,address(this),amount) (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#1347)
findings.name: calls-loop

findings.message: Pragma version^0.5.12 (../..0x32e574b0400cdb93dc33a34a30986737186bde43.sol#14) allows old versions
findings.name: solc-version
